def InitializeRow(entity, row): from System.Threading import Thread from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerIdentity
usuario = BennerIdentity.Current.UserHandle ehGestor = Thread.CurrentPrincipal.IsInRole("K_CRM_GESTOR_COMERCIAL")
responsavel = entity.Fields["CONTATO"].Instance.Fields["PESSOA"].Instance.Fields["USUARIORESPONSAVEL"].Handle
ehResponsavel = (usuario == responsavel)
if row.GetCustomCommand("cmdEmail") != None: row.GetCustomCommand("cmdEmail").Enabled = (ehGestor or ehResponsavel)
